    • Method Detail

      • findOne

        public T findOne(long id)
        Find by primary key. Search for an entity of the specified class and primary key. If the entity instance is contained in the persistence context, it is returned from there.
        Parameters:
        id - primary key
        Returns:
        the found entity instance or null if the entity does not exist
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the first argument does not denote an entity type or the second argument is is not a valid type for that entity's primary key or is null

      • exists

        public boolean exists(long id)
        Checks whether the entity exists for the specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity that should be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the entity exists for the given id; false otherwise.

      • save

        public T save(T entity)
        Merge the state of the given entity into the current persistence context.
        Parameters:
        entity - entity instance
        Returns:
        the managed instance that the state was merged to or null if null was entered
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if instance is not an entity or is a removed entity
        javax.persistence.TransactionRequiredException - if there is no transaction when invoked on a container-managed entity manager of that is of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION

      • delete

        public void delete(long id)
        Deletes the entity if it exists.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the entity instance
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.Iterable<T> echo.entities)
        Deletes a list of echo.entities.
        Parameters:
        echo.entities - the list of the entity instances
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction

      • delete

        public void delete(T entity)
        Deletes the entity if it exists.
        Parameters:
        entity - the managed entity instance
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.TransactionRequiredException - if invoked on a container-managed entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION and there is no transaction

      • count

        public long count()
        Counts all existing echo.entities.
        Returns:
        the number of all existing echo.entities in the persistence context.

      • findAll

        public java.util.List<T> findAll()
        Finds all entries the given entity.
        Returns:
        A list of all existing echo.entities.
